meanings.definition: A person or company that provides furniture or other items for a home or building.
meanings.sent1: The furnishers delivered a new sofa to our house.
meanings.sent2: We hired professional furnishers to decorate our office space.
meanings.sent3: The furnishers accidentally delivered a dining table to the wrong address, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The furnishers were like artists, transforming empty rooms into cozy living spaces.
meanings.sent5: The furnishers carefully selected each piece to create a harmonious atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of providing furniture or other items for a home or building.
meanings.sent1: Our company specializes in furnishers for luxury apartments.
meanings.sent2: She took care of all the furnishers for the new hotel opening.
meanings.sent3: The furnishers for the movie set had to work quickly to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent4: The furnishers of the party created a festive ambiance with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent5: Choosing the right furnishers can make a small space feel much larger.
